response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value for me, but considering its importance to you, I believe it's worth sharing with someone who appreciates it as much as you do. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $12,000. I trust this price reflects both the value I place on it and the value you see in it. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 12000}
